title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 21.8 - Alternate service provision for resale
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 21.8 - Alternate service provision for resale

State Regulations

The availability of resale telephone service shall in no
way interfere with the right of an owner or occupant of premises to obtain
service from the duly certificated landline company serving the
territory. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
21.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
